sections.heading: Members; expenses allowed; when
sections.text: Each member of the Legislature shall be allowed necessary expenses incurred while performing in the official capacity as a member of the Legislature.SourceLaws 1981, LB 206, ยง 2.AnnotationsPursuant to Article III, section 7, of the Constitution of Nebraska and this se

sections.heading: 50-201 and 50-202 are not in conflict with Article III, section 7, of the Nebraska Constitution
sections.text: State ex rel. Douglas v. Beermann, 216 Neb. 849, 347 N.W.2d 297 (1984).
